landing-text1: We would love it if you come by us for a stay, for dinner or just for a coffee and some snacks.
landing-text2: If there is anything you are wondering about, please do not hesitate to get in touch with us, By phone, through our Facebook page, the contact form below or in person..
landing-text3: Are you wondering about accommodations? The possibility of a special event or maybe a dinner party? The recipe for our delicious kanelbolle? Letâ€™s have a talk?
contact-back: How should we get back to you?
error-name: We would really like to have your name.
error-message: There has to be something here. A "Hi!" at least.
feedback: We'll answere you as soon as we can!
